TopicTitle: Can I get mission end stats WITHOUT crashing?

Articles.Content:
There's this summary screen after you crash your vehicle. Distance travelled, highest altitude, highest g, log of parts failing etc.

Can I somehow get that screen after a successful landing?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-14T22:22:02Z" title="06/14/2015 10:22  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 14, 2015</time> by Sharpy**
F3 brings up that screen at any point.
